content: Do you believe, Do you believe, Do you believe
Oh yes I believe in the Father and the Son
And the Holy Spirit, Yes I believe
Do you believe yes I believe
Mighty Father I believe
Who created heaven and earth
I believe in Jesus Christ
Everlasting Son of God
Oh yes I believe in the Father and the Son
And the Holy Spirit, Yes I believe
Equal in the Father's power
And through Him all things were made
He it was who saved us all
And from heaven He came to earth
Oh yes I believe in the Father and the Son
And the Holy Spirit, Yes I believe
Of the Virgin Mary born
By the Spirit was made flesh
Suffered death was crucified
And He rose up from the dead
Oh yes I believe in the Father and the Son
And the Holy Spirit, Yes I believe
He ascended into heaven
And His kingdom has no end
In the Spirit I believe
Lord and Vivifier of all
Oh yes I believe in the Father and the Son
And the Holy Spirit, Yes I believe
With the Father and the Son
He's adored and glorified
I believe in the Holy Church
And one baptism professed
Oh yes I believe in the Father and the Son
And the Holy Spirit, Yes I believe
I shall see him there in heaven
Living in the world to come
Amen, Amen, Amen
Amen, Amen, Amen
Oh yes I believe in the Father and the Son
And the Holy Spirit, Yes I believe
